name: Labscape
description:
This game is made by us, Waldigames, and is a submission for the Brackeys Game Jam.

We had so much fun developing this, that we will probably keep working on it.

In this small 3d platformer, you play as a half-human, half-robot cyborg, which tries to escape a disused military laboratory. The only thing which can help you is a small military rover to explore the environment and open you some closed gates.
